news.title: Live Report: Perfume Genius shimmers on the National Stadium stage
news.summary: Perfume Genius performed an emotional collection of tragic synth infused ballads, as well as an array of moody covers in an illuminating National Stadium show.

news.title: Live Report: Aaron Rowe brings his fans to tears at Whelan's
news.summary: Although still an up-and-coming artist, Aaron Rowe has curated a passionate fanbase that would put far bigger artists to shame.

news.title: Best of Dublin: Roz Purcell graces the cover of this year's guide to the city's top restaurants, bars, days out and more

news.title: Dec Pierce shares diagnosis: "It's important to know that men can get breast cancer too"
news.summary: Pierce said all his upcoming shows are set to go ahead as planned, including his December 14 gig at Dublin's 3Olympia Theatre.
